name: DOH Personal Information Sheet (HTS Form 2021) - Enhanced OCR Mapping

fields.name: nameAndSignature
fields.label: Name and Signature of Patient/Client
fields.query: What is the name and signature of the patient/client?

fields.label: Email Address

fields.label: Verbal Consent
fields.query: Was verbal consent obtained from the client?
fields.checkIndicator: / (slash mark indicates checked/selected - Yes)

sections.label: Paid for sex (in cash or kind)

Shared needles in injection of drugs

form-field.description: Extract text from defined rectangular region

checkbox-detection.description: Detect if checkbox is marked (dark pixel analysis)

checkbox-with-nested-fields.description: Checkbox that reveals sub-fields when selected

extractionNotes: OCR mapping uses relative coordinates (0-1 scale) for resolution independence
Coordinates are measured from top-left (0,0) to bottom-right (1,1)
Checkbox detection uses pixel analysis: >30% dark pixels = checked
Multiple extraction strategies support different field types
Conditional fields only extracted when parent checkbox is selected
Text normalization: CAPITAL LETTERS typical for handwritten entries
Date formats: Primary MM/DD/YYYY, fallback DD/MM/YYYY
Testing facility expected: 'LoveYourself Inc.' or 'LoveYourself Inc. (Bagani)'
